value.stringValue: The address is not valid. Error code:

choices.name: BillToAndShipTo
choices.choiceText: Bill-To Address and Ship-To Address (the new address will be applied to both Bill-To and Ship-To)

choices.name: CopyBillTo
choices.choiceText: Copy the Bill-To Address to the Ship-To Address

choices.name: CopyShipTo
choices.choiceText: Copy the Ship-To Address to the Bill-To Address

decisions.name: Address_should_be_copied
decisions.label: Address should be copied from bill-to/ship-to?

Flow.description: CH 18/07/2023: init CH 16/08/2023: Changed field assignments to match fields created in DEV CH 20/10/2023: Added operating company assignment

formulas.name: selectedAddressType_FORM
formulas.expression: IF({!Select_which_type_of_address_you_d_like_to_add}='Bill-To Address', 'bill-to', IF({!Select_which_type_of_address_you_d_like_to_add}='Ship-To Address', 'ship-to', IF({!Select_which_type_of_address_you_d_like_to_add}='Bill-To Address and Ship-To Address (the new address will be applied to both Bill-To and Ship-To)', 'both', IF({!Select_which_type_of_address_you_d_like_to_add}='Copy the Bill-To Address to the Ship-To Address', 'copy-bill', IF({!Select_which_type_of_address_you_d_like_to_add}='Copy the Ship-To Address to the Bill-To Address', 'copy-ship', 'additional')))))

Flow.label: Generic_Address_Adder

fields.fieldText: Would you like to add another address?

fields.fieldText: Please fill out the following information for the new address:
